definition: Abe (Japanese surname)
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
(two, three etc) -fold/times (multiplier)/double/to increase or multiply
Abe Shinzo (1954-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2006-2007 and from 2012

sentences.english: In much of the US, particularly the south and south west, Abe would be a left-winger.
sentences.chinese: 以美国特别是南方和西南部，安倍是左派。

sentences.english: Abe succeeded in having it extended last year.
sentences.chinese: 安倍成功的使其在去年得以延期。

sentences.english: Will Premier Wen press Abe to make commitment of not visiting the Yasukuni Shrine?
sentences.chinese: 温家宝总理是否会让安倍作出不参拜靖国神社的承诺？

sentences.english: Abe told reporters after the talks that the countries made a "first step" toward reconciliation.
sentences.chinese: 会谈后，安倍对记者说，两国朝和解迈出了第一步。

sentences.english: All at a time when Japanis economically vulnerable due to the dismal failure of Abenomics.
sentences.chinese: 安倍经济学沮丧的失败使得日本在经济上变得脆弱。

sentences.english: The fundamental problem wasn t Mr Abe but thejapanese society herself.
sentences.chinese: 根本问题不在于安倍先生，而是日本社会本身。

sentences.english: Abe's resignation will have little impact on Sino-Japanese relations, Liu said.
sentences.chinese: 刘江勇认为，安倍的辞职对中日关系的影响微乎其微。

sentences.english: And Japanese former(foreign) minister Taro Aso said mister Abe may visit China as early as October.
sentences.chinese: 日本外相麻生太郎称安倍会在十月初访问中国。

sentences.english: Abe will most likely try to explain to the president.
sentences.chinese: 安倍晋三极有可能会努力向特朗普解释该政策。

sentences.english: Abe quit after one year in office after an election rout.
sentences.chinese: 安倍任职一年后便在一次选举失利后辞职。

sentences.english: Mr Abe has studiously suppressed a debate about raising the consumption tax.
sentences.chinese: 安倍已然刻意地压制了一场关于提升消费税的争论。

sentences.english: Indeed, pundits are already talking about the post-Abe era.
sentences.chinese: 实际上“专家团”已经开始在谈论“后安倍时代”。

sentences.english: Japan's PM Shinzo Abe should accept the facts and admit to these atrocities.
sentences.chinese: 日本首相安倍应该接受这些事实并承认暴行。

sentences.english: Abe cannot bend to Onaga because he already has to bend over for the Americans.
sentences.chinese: 安倍不能向翁长雄志屈服是因为他已经向美国屈服了。
安倍经济学就是个灾难。

Liberal Democratic Party (Japanese political party)

minister of defense (esp. in Japan)
MORI Yoshirō (1937-), Japanese rugby player and politician, prime minister 2000-2001, famous for numerous gaffes
Kyōdō, Japanese news agency
Business News/Sankei Shimbun (Tokyo daily)
ASŌ Tarō (1940-), Japanese entrepreneur and LDP politician, prime minister from 2008
KAN Naoto (1946-), Japanese Democratic Party politician, prime minister 2010-2011
foreign ministry (e.g. of Japan or Korea)
